title: Marnie Simpson is 'struggling' with late stages of pregnancy
text:
She is already overdue to give birth by more than a week.

And Marnie Simpson has admitted that she is 'really suffering' in the late stage of her pregnancy, as she shared a snap of her baby bump on her Instagram Story.

The former Geordie Shore star, 27, is expecting a baby boy with her boyfriend Casey Johnson, but has admitted she's starting to feel 'so uncomfortable' as she waits for their new arrival, as she's now eight days past her expected due date.

Struggles: Marnie Simpson has admitted that she is 'really suffering' in the late stage of her pregnancy, as she shared a snap of her baby bump on her Instagram Story

Posting on the photo-sharing site, Marnie shared a candid snap of herself looking fed up as she lifted her T-shirt to reveal her huge bump underneath.

Alongside the image, she wrote: 'Look How big my bump is guys I'm 8 days over due now and really badly suffering! Sorry I've been a little inactive it's just I'm so uncomfortable no.

She added: 'Wanna keep you all updated as much as possible but struggling to even talk now lol. Thanks for all the constant support and messages love you all loads I'll let you know when little one has made his arrival (sic).'

Expectant: The former Geordie Shore star, 27, is expecting a baby boy with her boyfriend Casey Johnson, but has admitted she's starting to feel 'so uncomfortable' as she waits for their new arrival

The reality star has closely documented her difficulty with her pregnancy, as just days ago she revealed she was having trouble sleeping.

Marnie admitted she endured the most 'restless night sleep ever', and things are only getting worse as she continues to wait to go into labour.

The beauty's pregnancy hasn't been without weird cravings either, as she previously claimed she has been hankering after bath sponges, because she loves to suck the water out of them.

She said: 'I've been craving bath sponges. I like sucking the water out of them.'

Updates: Posting on the photo-sharing site, Marnie shared a snap of herself looking fed up as she lifted her T-shirt to reveal her huge bump underneath

Whilst a bemused Casey added: 'It's a weird craving. I actually have a video of her doing it.

'I literally bought her some sponges the other day but she said they weren't the right ones, so I've got to let her buy her own now.'

Marnie was due to give birth on October 16, and said in August she couldn't wait for her son to arrive.

She said: 'In the beginning I suffered with nausea, but since getting past 20 weeks I've been a lot better. Considering how bad some people's pregnancies are, I think it's been alright. 'I feel so swollen and bloated, I can't wait for him to arrive now.'
description: Marnie Simpson has admitted that she is 'really suffering' in the late stage of her pregnancy, as she shared a snap of her baby bump on her Instagram Story.
